Reviews.Content: Beautiful location       view from bungalow balcony
Reviews.Author: crystal_bs

Reviews.Content: wonderfull place in the ricefields The view from our bungalow was absolutely beautiful. We had a bungalow with a fan wich was fine. A simple breakfast was served at the outdoor livingroom. Hotel has a shuttle service to Ubud centre, but the distance is easy to walk. swimmigpool is great. If you like a quiet low profile hotel this is the place.
Reviews.Author: JonandMar

Reviews.Content: Great deal on a beautiful bungalow       View from upper deck in room
Reviews.Author: Runner100

Reviews.Content: Agung Raka Hotel My husband and I stayed at the Agung Raka Hotel for 8 nights in total as we found Ubud to be very central and could reach many attractions easily from there. We requested the superior room and got the honeymoon suite which after 36 years of marriage was fun! The superior rooms are in the rice fields and very pretty and private. Crazy design of rooms but we got used to that as we found it all over Bali. The last night at Agung Raka (we requested to stay on) we had to stay in the regular room which was OK but not much privacy and the bedroom could really only fit the bed and not much else. The bathroom was up to date but huge. In this hotel all bedrooms are upstairs and bathrooms downstairs but we sort of got used to it. The nasi goreng they served for breakfast was excellent. The American breakfast wasn't very good. One of the best things about Agung Raka was that it was a little way out of Ubud with all the noise etc and the free shuttle service to any where in town and back at any time saved our feet and purses!
Reviews.Author: Craighall56

Reviews.Content: Good value for money. Nice experience!       Our Bungalow
Reviews.Author: myholidayjournal

Reviews.Content: A very nice stay       First bungalow
Reviews.Author: petite_voyageuse

Reviews.Content: The View! We stayed two nights at the Agung Raka in Ubud in July, 2004. Like so many things in Bali, the rate is very negotiable. We had the queen bungalow. It was spectacular to look at; but, not all that comfortable in terms of lighting and furniture. However, the bathroom and the view are incredible. The veranda and the rice paddies make up for whatever may be lacking in hot water or chairs. It is exceptionally beautiful. You are surrounded by rice paddies and serenity. It is incredibly romantic.
Reviews.Author: Tek
